name: Heist Master
description:
You are a thief and must steal the most valuable things in the world for your collection.
But it would be so easy...
Puzzles and difficult opponents appear before you, as well as special operations that must be completed with unprecedented caution.
But you are not alone, you have the opportunity to call more experienced heroes for your operations, as well as improve their abilities during the game.
Go through all the significant places, collect the entire collection, and become the best thief in history.
